tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. Sandeep and his staff are warm, professional , and made me feel extremely cared for throughout my time with them. It’s very clear that Dr. Sandeep is very experienced and knowledgeable. He explained all the treatment and the Process very nicely. My Root Canal treatment was done very properly. He does advise and answers all my Question or concerns.I always had a fear when it comes to Visit a Dentist. But this was the best experience, and all my fear were washed away. It was a Pain less process for which I am very Grateful to Him.There is no other dentist I would go to or recommend! When you find the best, you keep it!  A big Thank you to him and his team for the great work.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

I will recommend d doctor to my friends, relatives n
well wishers.
